publicationStmt.publisher: The Characters that shaped the Silk Road - A Database and Digital Paleography of Tarim

seg.seg: from the house (?) (of) Lāpar (?), (the coins) for alcoholic beverage of the 9th year:
In the 9th year, in the 12th month, on the 3rd day. Kṣemakule of Bahi-?
has given the coins (for?) 9th-year alcoholic beverage from the house in Lāpar (?): 300 māṣas.

list.item:
• "(*ase)" and "(*o)" in [[Ching 2013a]] taken as reconstructions, her "." taken as "·", her "?" and last "." ignored. –Martin (Mon, 2014-08-25, 12:03:37)
  • [[Ching 2010]]: 329-330 has:

    Transcription:

    a1 – – [ññ]· – ·[d](elats)[tse](ñ)[ñ]e kṣemakule wasa

    a2 [l]l[aika]r ostame[ṃ] ñu kṣunaṣṣe

    a3 motaṣṣeṃ tarya käṃnte •

    b1 saṃ 4 4 1 [m](ā)_se [10 2 d](i)[va_s](e) [2 s]e eṃdelad_sañe kṣemagole

    b2 [d]ida laigāraṃ[mi g](o)ṭhade nava kṣuni[ya] masu[vīya] māṣa 1 2 100

    b3 [su]_sici [pra](ti)chida

    Translation:

    a1-3 ... Kṣemakule of *Endelatstse has given, from the house(?) (of) [Llaikar], (the coins) of alcoholic beverage of the 9th year: three hundred. •

    b1 In the 9th year, [in the 12th month, on the 2nd day.] Kṣemagole of Eṃdelad_sañe

    b2 has given, (for?) the '9th-year' alcoholic beverage from *goṭha in Laigāra, 300 māṣas.

    b3 [Su]_sici has [received].

    –Martin (Tue, 2015-06-30, 22:36:06 (CEST))

  • [[Adams 2012]]: 10-11 has a1-3:

    [E](nd)r[e](tst)[se](ñ)[ñ](e) Kṣemakule wasa [y] L[aika]r ostame[ṃ] ñu-kṣunaṣṣe motaṣṣeṃ tarya käṃnte

    Eṃdeladsañe Kṣemagole [d]ida Laiǵāraṃ[mi g](o)ṭhade nava kṣuni[ya] masu[vīya] māṣa 300

    "Kṣemakula from Endere gave from the house/farm in/at Laikar pertaining to wine of the ninth regnal-year vintage 300 [k_uśānes]"

    –Martin (Wed, 2015-08-05, 02:16:27 (CEST))

a1 – – ññ· – – – ·s· ·ñ· kṣemakule wasa a2 laipor ostameṃ ñu kṣunaṣṣe a3 motaṣṣeṃ tarya kante|käṃnte • b1 saṃ 4 4 1 mase 12 d(i)v(ase) 3 ba hi ·e la dse ñe kṣemagole b2 dida laibhuraṃmi g(o)ṭhade nava kṣoni ma so ·i māṣa 300 b3 ·i ci p(rati)chida

a1 Kṣemakule of ... has given, a2 from the house (?) (of) Lāpar (?), (the coins) for alcoholic beverage of the 9th year: a3 three hundred. b1 In the 9th year, in the 12th month, on the 3rd day. Kṣemakule of Bahi-? b2 has given the coins (for?) 9th-year alcoholic beverage from the house in Lāpar (?): 300 māṣas. b3 ... has received (them).

a1 – – [ññ]· – – – ·s· ·ñ· kṣemakule wasa a2 l[aipo]_r[\] ostame[ṃ] ñu kṣunaṣṣe a3 motaṣṣeṃ tarya _k_aṃnte • b1 [saṃ] 4 4 1 [ma]_se 10-[2] d(i)[v](a_se) [3] ba hi ·e la d_se ñe kṣemagole b2 dida lai[bhur]aṃ[m]i [g](o)ṭhade nava kṣo[n]i ma so ·i māṣa 3-100 b3 ·i [c]i [p](rati)chida

div.p: • "(*ase)" and "(*o)" in </bibl> taken as reconstructions, her "." taken as "·", her "?" and last "." ignored. –Martin (Mon, 2014-08-25, 12:03:37)</li><li><bibl><title corresp="ref:ching2010"/><citedRange>329-330</citedRange></bibl> has: <p><b>Transcription:</b></p> <p>a1 – – [ññ]· – ·[d](elats)[tse](ñ)[ñ]e kṣemakule wasa</p> <p>a2 [l]l[aika]r ostame[ṃ] ñu kṣunaṣṣe</p> <p>a3 motaṣṣeṃ tarya käṃnte •</p> <p>b1 <distinct type="ms_text">saṃ 4 4 1 [m](ā)_se [10 2 d](i)[va_s](e) [2 s]e eṃdelad_sañe kṣemagole</distinct></p> <p>b2 [d]ida laigāraṃ[mi g](o)ṭhade nava kṣuni[ya] masu[vīya] māṣa 1 2 100</p> <p>b3 <distinct type="ms_text">[su]_sici [pra](ti)chida</distinct></p> <p><b>Translation:</b></p> <p>a1-3 ... <hi>Kṣemakule</hi> of *<hi>Endelatstse</hi> has given, from the house(?) (of) [<hi>Llaikar</hi>], (the coins) of alcoholic beverage of the 9th year: three hundred. •</p> <p>b1 In the 9th year, [in the 12th month, on the 2nd day.] <hi>Kṣemagole</hi> of <distinct type="ms_text">Eṃdelad_sañe</distinct></p> <p>b2 has given, (for?) the '9th-year' alcoholic beverage from *<hi>goṭha</hi> in <hi>Laigāra</hi>, 300 <hi>māṣas</hi>.</p> <p>b3 <distinct type="ms_text">[Su]_sici</distinct> has [received].</p> <p>–Martin (Tue, 2015-06-30, 22:36:06 (CEST))</p></li><li><bibl><title corresp="ref:adams2012"/><citedRange>10-11</citedRange></bibl> has <ref type="ms" target="__a1-3"/>: <p>[E](nd)r[e](tst)[se](ñ)[ñ](e) Kṣemakule wasa [y] L[aika]r ostame[ṃ] ñu-kṣunaṣṣe motaṣṣeṃ tarya käṃnte</p> <p>Eṃdelad<hi rend="underline">s</hi>añe Kṣemagole [d]ida Laiǵāraṃ[mi g](o)ṭhade nava kṣuni[ya] masu[vīya] māṣa 300</p> <p>"Kṣemakula from Endere gave from the house/farm in/at Laikar pertaining to wine of the ninth regnal-year vintage 300 [<distinct type="ms_text">k_uśānes</distinct>]"</p> <p>–Martin (Wed, 2015-08-05, 02:16:27 (CEST))</p></li></ul></p></project_comment>
